subject: Re: DNS updates required
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -## Hello WolfIQ Support, We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below: https://support.combinate.me/requests/28759/satisfaction/new/uRb1cGih1FsX5jBFnHmkfju7c?locale=1176 Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about: Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 5 Sept 2024, 11:47 GMT+10 Hi Heath, We'll close this ticket for now as the client has yet to send a formal cancellation request. We'll open a new one once we're ready to delete the site officially. Thanks! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 19 Aug 2024, 16:42 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Yes sure, noted regarding the deadlines. Yes, we can backup the site even though it's down. Thanks, Heath Maguire support@wolfiq.com.au Are you impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15mins/month
  • Pro Care Plans - 2hrs/month
  • Expert Care Plan - 5hrs/month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $109/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2670832195-122454#}

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#28759) has been solved. To reopen this request, reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/28759 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 5 Sept 2024, 11:47 GMT+10 Hi Heath, We'll close this ticket for now as the client has yet to send a formal cancellation request. We'll open a new one once we're ready to delete the site officially. Thanks! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 19 Aug 2024, 16:42 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Yes sure, noted regarding the deadlines. Yes, we can backup the site even though it's down. Thanks, Heath Maguire support@wolfiq.com.au Are you impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15mins/month
  • Pro Care Plans - 2hrs/month
  • Expert Care Plan - 5hrs/month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $109/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2670832195-122454#}

Hi Alyssa,

Yes sure, noted regarding the deadlines.

Yes, we can backup the site even though it's down.

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#28759) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/28759 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 16 Aug 2024, 10:42 GMT+10 Hi Heath, Just some updates:
  • Can we request that we have the deadline dates sent to us for items such as this ticket? It was not specified that the site would go down if not actioned in a specific date, and we would appreciate it if its explicitly mentioned next time so we can schedule the updates accordingly. Just so we can avoid this issue from arising again.
  • If we want to backup the NDIP site (even though its down), can we do that?
Keen to hear back from you, thanks. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 16 Aug 2024, 09:57 GMT+10 Thanks, Heath. Looks to be reflecting now! We'll review the remaining items in our ticket and get back to you shortly. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 16 Aug 2024, 09:54 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, We have cleared the server cache, that should help. If you still can't see the changes please try in an incognito browser or clear your browsers cache. Thanks, Heath Maguire support@wolfiq.com.au Are you impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15mins/month
  • Pro Care Plans - 2hrs/month
  • Expert Care Plan - 5hrs/month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $109/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2670832195-122454#}

We'll review the remaining items in our ticket and get back to you shortly. Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 16 Aug 2024, 09:54 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, We have cleared the server cache, that should help. If you still can't see the changes please try in an incognito browser or clear your browsers cache. Thanks, Heath Maguire support@wolfiq.com.au Are you impressed with our service? Hi Alyssa,

We have cleared the server cache, that should help. If you still can't see the changes please try in an incognito browser or clear your browsers cache.

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#28759) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/28759 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 16 Aug 2024, 09:36 GMT+10 Hi Heath, Thanks. Checking the site, I can still see the same NULL message on the same places: https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/ - https://cbo.d.pr/i/AJOFle https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/find-a-specialist/ https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/career-opportunities/ - https://cbo.d.pr/i/2L2SUV I've checked both in Incognito and using a different browser (Safari), same result. Are you able to double check for me please? Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 16 Aug 2024, 09:26 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Confirming we have removed the NULL message. Please note, that was present prior to the site going offline yesterday. Here is a WayBack machine reference if that helps: https://web.archive.org/web/20240317005904/https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/ Standing by for the update on ndip.com.au. Thanks, Heath Maguire support@wolfiq.com.au Are you impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Your website Care Plan includes Developer Time, which is used to complete your requests. The included time varies across our plans:
  • Lite Care Plans - 15mins/month
  • Pro Care Plans - 2hrs/month
  • Expert Care Plan - 5hrs/month
If you require extra Developer Time to complete this request, it will be billed at $109/hr inc GST. Please let us know if you would like a quote before we commence your request. {#HS:2670832195-122454#}

Hi Alyssa,

Confirming we have removed the NULL message. Please note, that was present prior to the site going offline yesterday. Here is a WayBack machine reference if that helps: https://web.archive.org/web/20240317005904/https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/

Standing by for the update on ndip.com.au.

##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#28759) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/28759 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 15 Aug 2024, 17:35 GMT+10 Hi Chris, As mentioned in our call, we found some NULL text on this site. https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au - https://cbo.d.pr/i/AJOFle https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/find-a-specialist/ https://www.nationaldentalspecialists.com.au/career-opportunities/ - https://cbo.d.pr/i/2L2SUV It looks like one of the key elements on the site is not loading properly. Can you please look into this as well urgently and let us know once resolved please? Thank you! Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 15 Aug 2024, 13:47 GMT+10 Hi Heath, Just wondering if we have updates here? The sites have been down for quite some time and the client is getting concerned. Do we have an ETA we can provide them when we can expect them go back up? Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support) 15 Aug 2024, 12:24 GMT+10 Hi Heath, These two have been updated. Can we now make the changes please? CNAME record for nationaldentalspecialists.com.au: Name: _acme-challenge Value: http://nationaldentalspecialists.com.au.kinstavalidation.app/ CNAME record for cbddental.com.au: Name: _acme-challenge Value: http://cbddental.com.au.kinstavalidation.app/ Note that NDIP was sold to a different business, hence it wasn't updated. We'll confirm if this needs to be cancelled officially and let you know. For now, can you let us know once the sites are back up? Regards, Alyssa Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 15 Aug 2024, 11:45 GMT+10 Hi Alyssa, Yes, the SSL certs have expired. We need those updates to get them reissued. Thanks, Heath Maguire support@wolfiq.com.au Are you impressed with our service? Click here to review us on Google! Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support)

15 Aug 2024, 11:43 GMT+10

Hi Heath,

The team are now looking into this updates.

However, we noticed that https://www.cbddental.com.au/ is down. Can you look into this urgently and advise what's the cause of the issue please? Is it the delay in the update?

Please let us know.

Regards,
Alyssa

1300 247 018



Alyssa Venturanza (Combinate Support)

Sure thing. We'll add this to our queue and let you know once updated.

Regards,
Alyssa

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018



WolfIQ Support

5 Aug 2024, 15:12 GMT+10

Hi Alyssa,

I hope you have been well. Can you please action the below DNS updates so that we can renew the website's SSL certificates:

CNAME record for nationaldentalspecialists.com.au:
Name: _acme-challenge
Value: nationaldentalspecialists.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

CNAME record for ndip.com.au:
Name: _acme-challenge
Value: ndip.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

CNAME record for cbddental.com.au:
Name: _acme-challenge
Value: cbddental.com.au.kinstavalidation.app

Please let us know when updated and we will verify.

Thanks,

Heath Maguire

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
